name: Fatty Rabbit Hole
description: Fatty Rabbit Hole is an action arcade game where you play as a rabbit who loves junk food, falling down a hole. Eat as much junk food as you can, avoid gross healthy foods, obstacles, and an assortment of dastardly foes. Inspired by the improv comedy of the podcast Matt & Mattingly's Ice Cream Social.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.5 Ghz or better Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 700 series / AMD Rx200 series or later DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 32 MB available space
